title: Hidden Heddon - our new London date night favourite
text:
We’re not ashamed to say that London Cocktail Week is one of our favourite times of year – not just for the booze (promise), but mostly for the chance to discover great new places to drink, dine and date around the city.

One of our favourite recent discoveries for a cocktail is Hidden Heddon, a new spot under Gordon Ramsay’s Heddon Street Kitchen just off Regent Street. Open every evening from Thursday to Saturday (no bookings required, you can just walk in), there’s a definite sense of the weekend in the air in this urban underground bar. The cocktail menu ranges from the classics to the more adventurous, shaken up by the expert mixology team, and starting at a reasonable £7.50.

If you visit this week (or until 13 October), you’ll be lucky enough to get to try the very special cocktail created especially for Guardian Soulmates for London Cocktail Week. ‘You & Me’ is a blend of Bombay Sapphire Gin, extra shiso umeshu plum wine, lime juice and a homemade sweet wasabi syrup, a perfect match of sweet and sharp. Plus, as it’s #LCW, the cocktail is priced at just £6.

As if that’s not exciting enough, we think every date night deserves a little sparkle, so Soulmates members will receive a complimentary glass of fizz when dining upstairs in the main restaurant at Heddon Street Kitchen, quoting ‘Guardian Soulmates’ at the time of booking*.

We love Hidden Heddon for a fun date in a central location, great for a drink or two before or after dinner in the restaurant upstairs. And with ‘You & Me’ available only until 13 October, what are you waiting for?

For more information on Hidden Heddon, visit hiddenheddon.com. To make a booking at Heddon Street Kitchen, call 0207 592 1212 or book online at https://www.gordonramsayrestaurants.com/heddon-street-kitchen

*Promotion available to 2 guests per party, when dining from the a la carte menu, not in conjunction with any offer. Available until 31 October 2019. Quote ‘GUARDIAN SOULMATES’ when booking.
description: London Cocktail Week is one of our favourite times of year, a time to discover great new places to drink, dine and date around the city.
